posts.content: Going to South Korea next week for the first time! Any must-visit places in Seoul? Would love some restaurant recommendations too! ğŸ˜Š

comments.author: seoul._.life
comments.content: You must visit Gyeongbokgung Palace and Bukchon Hanok Village! Also check out N Seoul Tower at night. For food, try the street food tour at Gwangjang Market!
